name: Sadiya
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May your family always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Sadiya!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back on whatsapp and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click on text, if you want to watch it again.
